summary: This is a merge of the [url=http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/34074//?]"Light elven Armor - UNP"[/url] by NewerMind43 and "Tru3Magics Light Elven Armor Retexture" by Tru3magic that allows you to have all at once.
descriptionHtml:
In the beginning came [url=http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/34074//?]"Light elven Armor - UNP"[/url] by NewerMind43 which was one very nice armor.
Then Tru3Magic came along and released [url=http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/34306//?]"Tru3Magics Light Elven Armor Retexture"[/url] and it got even better with more choices in texture.

But while Tru3Magic had seven new textures, only one could be used at any given time, and that meant that also NewerMind43s texture got overwritten.

I liked those armors and decided to do something about it. After about six hours I present to you those two Mods rolled into one.
You can now have all eight armors, four pair of boots and four pair of gloves at once.

All credits to NewerMind43 and Tru3Magic for this nice armor and the retexturing.

So if you like it guys, visit their mods site(see links) and download their files and Endorse them; for they are the ones who made this possible.

The mod requires the [url=http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/6709//?]UNP BodyType[/url] which can be found following the link.

[color=violet]Manual Installation;[/color]
Just put the "Light Elven Armor.bsa" and "Light Elven Armor.esp" in your "..skyrimdata" folder.
As of version 1.1, the files are named "Light_Elven_Armor-Merged.esp" and "Light_Elven_Armor-Merged.bsa"


[color=violet]Or use Nexus Mod Manager[/color]

[color=violet]Remove installation;[/color]
just delete mentioned files above.

A few small changes from the original mod.
Both armor and cloth version weight 6, cloth now weights 4. Gloves and Boots has been lowered from 2 to 1.5 clothing version.

Also base price has gone up for the armor version, as its harder than the clothing to make.

[color=violet]Thanks to NewerMind43 and Tru3Magic for allowing me to do this and upload it here on Nexus.[/color]

[center][color=red][size=4][color=red][size=4]Update 1.12[/size][/color]
[color=#ffffff][size=2]Redid the BSA files again, this time without any compression. Hopefully this will remove the plastic look on some of the clothes.
[/size][/color]
Update 1.11[/size][/color]
Obs forgot to fix some paths in the nif files so some texture did not show.

[color=red][size=4]Update 1.10[/size][/color]
This update is only for those who has a problem with the mod [url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/35665/?]Elven Follower Aranya.[/url] If the mod is working for you, there is no reason to upgrade. If you do upgrade, most likely you will also lose the armors you already have.[/center]

[color=red]This is a NEXUS only release. Any use of material from this mod, contact Tru3Magic and/or NewerMind43 for permission.[/color]
author: GenRabbit
